ygData.subject: Re: Pred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: Aerostreak, Grappler, and Guantix were placed in a large lounge type room with comfortable furniture and a display showing the features of the ship. Adrax

Subject: Re: Pred Base
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Aerostreak, Grappler, and Guantix were placed in a large lounge type room 
with comfortable furniture and a display showing the features of the ship. 
Adrax stood by as well, waiting for Black Aracnia. The Maximals had been 
placed in the Brig, seperate from each other until the Widow decided there 
fate.
    After a short while, Aracnia walked inside, bowcaster in claw, and wiped 
the dirst from her black and yellow armor. "Well, hello everyone."
    Aerostreak stood. "Commader Black Aracnia, I am Aerostreak, and these are 
my partners, Gunatix and Grappler. We came a long distance to find you."
    Black Aracnia nodded, and noted that Grappler was a red Tarantula. SHe 
made her way closer, and then remembered Adrax. "So, why have you come Adrax?"
    Adrax growled, "We wil ltalk later, behinde closed doors. For now I will 
show myself to quarters and rest."
    He stomper past her and out the door, leaveing her alone with the new 
additions to the Predacon force. She looked them over and decided they should 
have a lesson or two in basic training. Paralysis could do that. For now she 
would assign them rooms and have...Quickstrike brief them on the status of 
war.
    "Please, follow me. We have lots to discuss." She said, leading them to 
there rooms. Afterwards she would check on Darkmouse.
